title: Break in
description: When Alexandra Hastings was summoned to her boss’ office, the last thing she expected was to agree to an arranged marriage. With her sister in a clinch, the only person who can help her is her smug, insufferable boss. Agreeing to uproot her entire life in New York, she heads to Montana, accompanied by a brooding giant that can’t seem to stand her.Arguing with her at every turn, he’s the most infuriating man she’s ever met - so why is her body so drawn to him? The heat from her attraction seems to be thawing the wall of ice surrounding him though, and there’s only a matter of time before it’s melted away completely. But the question that remains is : Will she like what she finds when it’s gone?
author: Izzy Wolfe
